text:
QUESTIONNAIRE ON JOURNALISM QUARTERLY
This questionnaire is being distributed to all members of AEJ, to obtain
information which will be helpful in connection with Journalism Quarterly. When
completed, please mail to School of Journalism, University q£ Iowa. Iowa City.
1. Please check under the appropriate heading or headings below to indicate your
readership of each part of Journalism Quarterly.

2. How often do you refer to past issues of Journalism Quarterly after you finish
the first complete reading?
More than once a week_ Once a week_ Once in two weeks_
Once a month_ Once in six months_ Once a year_ Never
3. Check as many reasons as applicable for your receiving Journalism Quarterly.
Learn something_ Feel I should read it Intellectual satisfaction
Feel I should support its publication_ Like to have it aro&ftd
Expected to read it_ Habitual_ Receive it automatically_
Required reading_ Other (please describe):
4. Which of the following most nearly describes the usefulness of Journalism
Quarterly to you now, compared to, say, five years ago?
Decreased greatly Decreased_ Remained about the same_ Increased^
Increased greatly_
5. Do you think Journalism Quarterly provides the content generally desired by
most of the publication’s readers?
Definitely_ Probably_ Possibly_ No Opinion_ Possibly not_
Probahly not;_ Definitely not
